name: sass-starter
description: A starter template for building websites using Sass.

scripts.start: node-sass --include-path scss sass/style.scss css/style.css --output-style expanded && node-sass --include-path scss sass/style.scss css/style.min.css --output-style compressed && autoprefixer-cli -o css/style.css css/style.css && autoprefixer-cli -o css/style.min.css css/style.min.css

author: Josh Wenning
